medium: Aniline color on black and white photograph
title: Luriki
marks:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: untranslated an
description: four images:  top image of man with thick dark hair and moustache, wearing blue suit and black shirt, at left; old image of Stalin wearing uniform at right next to man; red curtain at right edge; three images at bottom:  image at left of two handwritten documents in Russian; center image of Stalin; right image of man with moustache full-length, in front of a peach curtain, standing on a green, red and yellow carpet
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
